document.full_text: a new york man who admitted smuggling nearly 4,000 live chinese snakehead fish, which pose a danger to fish native to u.s. waters, was arrested on criminal charges, prosecutors said on thursday.
document.title: new york man charged with importing banned fish from china
lines_and_colors: a new york man who admitted smuggling nearly 4,000 live chinese snakehead fish, which pose a danger to fish native to u.s. waters, was arrested on criminal charges, prosecutors said on thursday.
